"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const csharp_1 = require("csharp");
const Common_1 = require("Utils/Common");
class Button {
    constructor(btn) {
        this.btn = btn;
    }
    RegClickCallBack(tag, act) {
        this.btn.onClick.AddListener(act);
    }
}
exports.Button = Button;
class Text extends csharp_1.UnityEngine.UI.Text {
}
exports.Text = Text;
function $Button(name) {
    let btn = csharp_1.UIHelper.GetButton(name);
    if (btn == null) {
        Common_1.Debug.LogError("Buttom " + name + " Can Not Be Found!!!");
        return;
    }
    return new Button(btn);
}
exports.$Button = $Button;
const $Text = csharp_1.UIHelper.GetText;
exports.$Text = $Text;
